newsitem.title: UK: TENNIS-PLAY RESUMES AT WIMBLEDON AFTER TWO BLANK DAYS.
newsitem.headline: TENNIS-PLAY RESUMES AT WIMBLEDON AFTER TWO BLANK DAYS.

text.p: Play resumed at Wimbledon on Saturday after two days completely washed out by rain.
Natasha Zvereva of Belarus was first out on Centre Court with Russia's Elena Likhovtseva to finish their first round match begun on Wednesday.
On Number One court American prodigy Venus Williams, who has been waiting to play since Monday, was making her first appearance at Wimbledon against Poland's Magdalena Grzybowska.
